info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Behavior Adjustment
collection.openText: Eventually, intellect loses all meaning as they forget even how to exist.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Stats regarding Justice will increase greatly when $0 is equipped. However, all stats regarding Prudence will drop at the same time.
The wearer will enter a panic if ordered to return $0 within 30 seconds of equipping it and will die shortly after showing abnormal behavior.
If the wearer’s SP hits 0 while $0 is equipped, they will instantly die.
